item.title: Need a server hoster
item.dc:creator: @Teabag Teabag
item.description:
@Teabag wrote:

well the title of this thread is practically self-explanitory, although;

-I do not wish to pay someone to host my server other than with admin privlidges.
-I need someone in GMT timezone area, because I am british
-I require someone with the ability to have mature conversations ect. (so you will not piss around with server)

That’s all, thanks.

Read full topic
